prompt:
Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product embodies excellence and is tailored to meet the highest standards of performance and durability. We believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its unique features and benefits, we're extending an exclusive offer to you for $15000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the prestige associated with owning such a high-quality item. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and provide significant value to you. Please let us know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
